author: MSNBC
title: Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively to match up to $1 million in aid to displaced Ukrainians
description: Actors Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively said in a tweet that they will match up to $1 million in donations to aid Ukrainians displaced by the Russian invasion.
content:
Actors Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively have pledged to match up to $1 million in aid to displaced Ukrainians, Reynolds tweeted on Saturday. 
As of Sunday, roughly 368,000 Ukrainian refugees had arrivâ€¦ [+1238 chars]
